attributes.action: Justice - Why do Profits get a Bonus, and Failure gets bailed-out ?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We recall the story of the “rogue trader” of the 90’s,responsible for the collapse of Barings Bank. He was rewarded for huge profits in 1992. When he failed, he was found guilty of cheating, and sent to prison. Executives of Barings who were involved in the failure to control Leeson either resigned or were sacked. That sounds like justice. Huge risks and mis-representation are now camouflaged as “toxic assets”. Essentially, some bankers took huge risks to maximize profits and personal bonuses. Why does the same justice not seek out the “rouge traders” and their executives and punish them? The banking system is critical and needs to bailed out, but what about cleaning it too? We petition you to demonstrate resolve and carry out justice, as a true leader of the free world should.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
